sentence.Network_en: I do not pretend tha t my protestations should acquit me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我并不自称我的辩护一定能使自己无罪获释.

sentence.Network_en: I acquit Edward of all essential misconduct.
sentence.Network_cn: 我原谅爱德华的所有根本过错.

sentence.Network_en: That fact decided the judge to acquit him.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个事实使法官判他无罪.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(一)|联想记忆法背单词 ... acquisitive adj. 贪得无厌的；可获利的 acquit v. 宣告无罪 acrid adj. 辛辣的.
华东师大考博词汇 - 豆丁网 ... acquaintance 相识; 熟人 acquit 宣判无罪; 还清(债务) 2 acquisition 获得; 获得物.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... quitclaim n 放弃权利 acquit v 开释，免罪 acquittal n 释放；还清（债）.
法律专业词汇中英对照(a,b) ... action of debt 债务诉讼 acquit 无罪 adjourn 暂时停止执行.

list.abs: Be kept in prison for life终身入狱Be acquitted 宣告无罪，脱卸义务和责任，还清债务Calamity 灾难，不幸事件
I acquit Edward of all essential misconduct ., 我原谅爱德华的所有根本过错.
In a highly controversial verdict , the jury acquitted Simpson ., 陪审团最后对辛普森做出了极具争议的无罪判决.
i thought that he acquitted himself admirably in the meeting ., 我认为他在会议上表现得非常出色.

derivation.yuyuan_name: middle English  (originally in the sense 'pay a debt, discharge a liability'): from Old French acquiter, from medieval Latin acquitare 'pay a debt', from ad- 'to' + quitare 'set free'

entry.def: If someone is acquitted of a crime in a court of law, they are formally declared not to have committed the crime.

example.ex: Mr Ling was acquitted of disorderly behaviour by magistrates.
example.tran: 地方法官宣判林先生扰乱治安罪名不成立。

entry.def: If you acquit yourself well or admirably in a particular situation, other people feel that you have behaved well or admirably.

example.ex: Most officers and men acquitted themselves well throughout the action.
example.tran: 大多数军官及士兵在整个战斗中表现出色。

means.word_mean: 1. pronounce not guilty of criminal charges;

sentences.sentence: "The suspect was cleared of the murder charges"
"They conducted themselves well during these difficult times"

stems_affixes.word_buile: acquit[v.宣判[某人]无罪;表现]+al表名词→acquittal宣告无罪
quit放弃+claim呼喊,宣告→n.放弃权利 v.放弃合法权利
ac给予+quit自由→v.宣判[某人]无罪;表现

stems_affixes.value_cn: 离开,退出;停止,放弃,辞职

stems_affixes.word_buile: quit放弃+claim呼喊,宣告→n.放弃权利 v.放弃合法权利
re回+quit自由+e→回到自由状态→报答了别的恩惠

sentences.en: He was acquitted of a crime.
I thought that he acquitted himself admirably in the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我认为他在会议上表现得非常出色。

jushi.english: Five months ago she was acquitted on a shoplifting charge.
jushi.chinese: 五个月前她被宣判未犯入店行窃罪。

jushi.english: The jury acquitted him of murder.
jushi.chinese: 陪审团裁决他的谋杀罪不成立。
